建造・開発を行うのに使用する\n資材。:
Materials used for ship
construction and equipment
development.
装備を改修する為の資材、「改\n修工廠」で使用します。:
Used in the "Improvement
Arsenal" to improve
equipment.
開けると、中から少量の家具コ\nインが出現する。:
When you open it, a small
amount of furniture coins
will be revealed within.
開けると、中から中量の家具コ\nインが出現する。:
When you open it, a medium
amount of furniture coins
will be revealed within.
開けると、中から大量の家具コ\nインが出現する。:
When you open it, a large
amount of furniture coins
will be revealed within.
入渠ドックまたは工廠ドックを\n１つ開放できるキー。さらに、\n艦隊編成記録枠を:
A key that can open a repair
dock or a construction dock.
In addition, it can also add
an additional fleet preset
slot.
艦のスロットに装備する。装備\nした艦は1度だけ撃沈を回避で\nきる。:
(Emergency Repair
Personnel)
For ships to equip. When
consumed, the equipped
ship can avoid being sunk.
応急修理要員がパワーアップ！\n撃沈回避時に出撃能力が全回\n復。:
(Emergency Repair Goddess)
The Emergency Repair
Personnel has powered up!
Fully restores sortie
capability when the ship
using it is sunk.
特注家具を製作する職人さん。\n家具屋さんで使用する。:
A craftsman who makes
custom-made furniture.
Used in the Furniture Shop.
最大保有艦娘数＋10(最大500)。最大保有アイテム数＋40(最大2150)。:
Maximum number of ships
+10 (max 500).
Maximum number of items
+40 (max 2150).
艦隊全体の疲労度を回復する給\n糧艦。編成で使用可能。:
A food supply ship that
recovers the entire fleet from
fatigue. Can be used in the
"Fleet" menu.
ケッコンカッコカリに必要な書\n類一式と指輪。改装で使用す\nる。:
A set of documents and a
ring required for a
provisional marriage.
Used in the "Refit" menu.
艦娘から贈られたチョコ。ク\nリックして資源にするのもよ\nし、保存しておくのも:
Chocolates given by a
shipgirl. You can click on it
and get resources, or you
could also just keep it.
暁の水平線に勝利を刻んだ提督\nに贈られる「証」。資源や改修\n資材、または複数:
"Certificate" given to
admirals who have carved
victory over dawn's horizon.
It can be exchanged for
resources or improvement
materials, or even a
blueprint if you collect
several.
艦娘の「特別な改造」に使用す\nる設計図。:
A blueprint used for special
remodels of some shipgirls.
艦娘たちの士気を高揚させる新\n型給糧艦。編成で使用可能。:
A new type of food supply
ship that boosts the morale
of shipgirls. Can be used in
the "Fleet" menu.
特別な時期だけ発見が可能とな\nる丁寧に包装された「プレゼン\nト箱」。開封時に:
A carefully wrapped gift box
that can only be found
during special occasions.
The desired contents can be
selected upon opening the
box.
難易度の高い作戦を、精鋭の艦\n娘たちと共に攻略した提督のみ\nに贈られる勝利の:
This is a certificate of victory
given only to admirals who
have conquered a difficult
operation with their elite
shipgirls. That, is the "First
Class Medal". It can also be
exchanged for materials.
桃の節句の時期だけ発見が可能\nとなる美味しい「菱餅」です。\n展開時に希望の中:
These delicious "Hishimochi"
(water chestnuts) can only
be found during Hinamatsuri.
The desired contents can be
selected upon usage.
「任務」同時受託可能数を拡張\nすることができる司令部要員で\nす。使用すると、:
This is a headquarters
personnel that increases
the number of quests you
can accept simultaneously.
When used, you will be able
to undertake one more
quest at a time.
艦娘(練度30以上必要)を補強増\n設改修できます。同改修により\n補強増設装備:
Adds a reinforcement
expansion to a ship
(requires Lv.30 or higher).
This upgrade will add a
reinforcement expansion
equipment slot to the ship.
(One-time use)
本格的な大型航空母艦を、より\n強力に改装するための、特殊な\n航空艤装です。あ:
This is a special aviation
outfitting to remodel a
full-fledged large aircraft
carrier to make it more
powerful. It is used for the
second remodel of certain
classes of aircraft carriers.
腹が減ってはなんとやら……！\nこの戦闘糧食を装備して、合戦\n前にしっかりと腹:
When you're hungry... you
gotta get something! Equip
a shipgirl with a combat
ration and fill up her belly
before the decisive battle!
(Consumed on use)
戦闘航海中の洋上で燃料弾薬を\n艦隊補給することが可能です。\n艦隊決戦のサポー:
Replenish your fleet with fuel
and ammunition at sea
during a combat voyage.
Please support the fleet
decisive battle!
(Consumed on use)
漁場の安全を確保し、秋刀魚漁\nを支援することで入手した貴重\nな旬の「秋刀魚」:
This is a valuable seasonal
Saury obtained by ensuring
the safety of the fishing
grounds and supporting the
Saury fishery.
※ Will disappear at the end
　 of the Saury Festival.
旬の秋刀魚「蒲焼」缶詰です。\n単品はもちろん、おにぎり等と\n一緒に食すとより:
This is canned seasonal
Saury, "Kabayaki". Can be
eaten on its own, of course,
but tastes even better with
onigiri and the like!
(Consumed on use)
精鋭の航空部隊を新規編成する\nために必要な、熟練した技術を\n持つ、航空機搭乗:
A skilled and experienced
aircrew member that is
required in order to form a
new elite air force.
(※ Will be consumed when
forming an air force)
新開発の燃焼噴射推進器です。\n日本初の実用ジェットエンジン\nとして戦力化が期:
A newly developed
combustion jet propulsion.
There are high expectations
for its transformation into
combat potential as a
Japanese developed
production-ready jet engine.
(※ Can be used in quests or
equipment upgrading)
ある給糧艦が、新年の艦隊艦娘\nと提督の安全を祈って準備する\nお飾りの材料。３:
Materials for decorations
ensuring the safety of fleet
girls and admirals in the
New Year, prepared by a
certain food supply shipgirl.
You can craft fleet safety
decorations using 32 pieces.
飛行場などの設営に必要です。\n※基地航空隊の拡張も可能 \n※最大計99個ま:
Required for setting up
airfields and other facilities.
※ Can be used to expand
　 the number of air base
　 units.
※ Can have up to 99 in total.
新型航空機の開発、戦力化する\nために必要な技術図面です。 \n※開発には複数図:
(New Technology Aircraft
Blueprint)
These are the technical
drawings required to
develop and field a new
type of aircraft.　
※ Multiple drawings are
　 required for development.
※ Can be used in quests
　 and equipment upgrades.
新型砲熕兵装を開発及び戦力化\nに必要な技術図面と資材です。\n※任務や装備改修:
(New Model Gun Mount
Armament Materials)
A technical drawing that is
required for development
and utilisation of new
artillery armaments.
※ Can be used in quests,
　 equipment upgrading, etc.
※ Developing new large-
　 caliber main guns requires
　 multiple materials.
腹が減ってはなんとやら……！\n愛情たっぷり美味しさバッチリ\nの高栄養価新型戦:
When you're hungry... you
gotta get something! This is
a new type of high
nutritional value combat
food that is full of love and
deliciousness.
(Consumed on use)
新型航空機材を開発及び戦力化\nに必要な技術図面と資材です。\n※任務や装備改修:
(New Model Aerial
Armament Material)
A technical drawing that is
required for development
and utilisation of new
aircraft materials.
※ Can be used in quests,
　 equipment upgrading,
　 etc. to build new
　 aircraft models.
本資料の活用により、貴重な戦\n訓を今後の戦術や装備改修など\nにフィードバック:
This document can be used
to provide valuable feedback
based on combat training
for future tactics and
equipment modifications
among other things.
※ Upgrading the fleet
　 headquarters requires
　 multiple action reports.
令和二年２０２1年クリスマス\nに贈られる大きなプレゼント箱\nです。開封時に、:
This is a large gift box to be
given at Christmas 2021.
Upon opening the box, the
Admiral can choose what
he prefers within the
contents of the gift.
美味しい日本の「お米」です。\nふっくらと炊き上げて、召し上\nがれ！※食べ物イ:
This is delicious Japanese
rice. Cook it up nice and
fluffy, and enjoy!
※ Will disappear at the
　 end of the food event.
梅の実を独特の製法で漬けた\n「梅干」です。ご飯やおにぎり\nにもぴったりです※:
Umeboshi made by pickling
plum fruits using a unique
manufacturing method.
Perfect for rice, onigiri
(rice balls) and the such!
※ Will disappear at the
　 end of the food event.
身近な海産物「海苔」。ご飯や\nおにぎり、お茶漬けのお供にも\n欠かせません。※:
Nori seaweed is a familiar
marine product. It is
indispensable for rice,
onigiri (rice balls), and
ochazuke (rice with green
tea).
※ Will disappear at the
　 end of the food event.
「お茶」は心を落ち着かせてく\nれます。香り高い日本茶、お茶\n漬けも美味しい！:
Tea is calming and soothing.
Fragrant Japanese tea,
delicious ochazuke!
※ Will disappear at the
　 end of the food event.
あの暖簾をくぐって鳳翔さんの\n小料理屋へどうぞ。心尽くしア\nイテムと交換でき:
Please go through the
curtains and walk into
Houshou's small restaurant,
you're welcomed inside.
You can exchange this ticket
for a heartfelt item.
※ Will disappear after a
　 certain period of time.
「鬼は外！福は内！」\n季節の大切な行事、節分。今年\nも豆まきをして、健康に元:
"Devils out! Fortune in!"
Setsubun is an important
seasonal event. Let's do our
best to stay healthy and 
energetic by throwing beans
this year!
工作艦などの艦で緊急泊地修理\nを実施時に必要な資材です。 \n※緊急泊地修理を:
(Emergency Repair
Materials)
These are the materials
needed to perform
emergency repairs at an
anchorage using ships such
as repair ships.
※ Consumed when
　 performing emergency
　 anchorage repair.
新型噴進装備を開発及び戦力化\nに必要な技術図面と資材です。\n※任務や装備改修:
(New Model Rocket
Development Materials)
These are the technical
drawings and materials
required to develop and
field the new jet propulsion
equipment.
※ Can be used in quests
　 and equipment upgrades,
　 and to develop new jet
　 propulsion equipment.
漁場の安全を確保し、鰯漁を支\n援することで入手した美味しい\n旬の「鰯」です。:
These are delicious
seasonal sardines obtained
by ensuring the safety of the
fishing grounds and
supporting sardine fishing.
※ Will disappear at the end
　 of the Saury & Sardine
　 Festival.
新型兵装の開発及び実戦配備 \nに必要な技術図面と資材です。\n※装備改修等で使:
(New Model Armament
Materials)
These are the technical
drawings and materials
necessary for the
development and field
deployment of new types
of armaments.
※ Used in equipment
　 upgrades, to deploy new
　 types of armaments.
旗艦潜水母艦によって指揮され\nた潜水艦隊が潜水艦隊攻撃実施\n時に使用する補給:
(Submarine Supply Materials)
These supplies are used by
submarine fleets
commanded by a submarine
tender as flagship during
submarine attacks.
※ Consumed during the
　 attack.
